description:
Welcome to Hotel Simulator – Build and Manage Your Dream Hotel!

Step into the exciting world of hotel management with Hotel Simulator! Start with a small hotel and transform it into a luxurious five-star resort. Take control of every detail—design and furnish rooms, manage daily operations, and ensure your guests have an unforgettable stay. This immersive simulation game combines creativity and strategy, making it the perfect choice for fans of management games.

Furnish and Decorate Rooms
Create cozy and stylish rooms to meet the needs of your guests. Choose from a wide range of furniture, decor, and layouts to give each room a unique look. Whether your hotel’s theme is modern, classic, or tropical, your creativity will shine through. Satisfied guests will leave glowing reviews, boosting your reputation and attracting more visitors.

Run a Mini Shop for Guests
Enhance your hotel services with an on-site mini shop where guests can purchase snacks, toiletries, and souvenirs. Stock popular items, set competitive prices, and keep your shop well-organized. Balancing inventory and pricing adds a fun strategic element that will keep you engaged as you grow your business.

Keep Everything Spotless
Cleanliness is the foundation of a great hotel experience. Regularly tidy up rooms, restock supplies, and maintain common areas to keep your guests happy. A clean and welcoming environment boosts your hotel’s ratings and ensures repeat bookings.

Expand and Upgrade Your Hotel
Reinvest your earnings to unlock exciting upgrades and expand your hotel. Add more rooms, improve existing facilities, and introduce new amenities like a spa or gym. Each upgrade enhances the guest experience and increases your revenue.

Customize Your Hotel’s Style
Make your hotel stand out with personalized decor and design. Add stylish furniture, vibrant colors, and unique signage to create an atmosphere that leaves a lasting impression. From the lobby to the exterior, every detail is yours to customize.
